thread.title: BRIEF-Evoqua And Giotto Enter Agreement For Distribution Of Evoqua’S Memcor® Uf & Mbr Membrane Products

title: BRIEF-Evoqua And Giotto Enter Agreement For Distribution Of Evoqua’S Memcor® Uf & Mbr Membrane Products

organizations.name: giotto enter agreement for distribution of evoqua’s memcor

text:
April 11, 2018 / 1:37 PM / Updated 26 minutes ago BRIEF-Evoqua And Giotto Enter Agreement For Distribution Of Evoqua’S Memcor® Uf & Mbr Membrane Products Reuters Staff 
April 11 (Reuters) - Evoqua Water Technologies Corp : 
* EVOQUA AND GIOTTO ENTER AGREEMENT FOR DISTRIBUTION OF EVOQUA’S MEMCOR® UF & MBR MEMBRANE PRODUCTS 
* IN SEPARATE TRANSACTION, EVOQUA SOLD ALL REMAINING OPERATIONS OF FORMER ITALY BUSINESS, INCLUDING CUSTOMER CONTRACTS, TO GIOTTO 
* EXCLUSIVE AGREEMENT WITH GIOTTO WATER S.R.L. IN RELATION TO DISTRIBUTION OF EVOQUA’S MEMCOR PRODUCT RANGE IN EUROPE Source text for Eikon (nBw7chvk7a) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
